Name: Henry F. Grady
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Notes: Accredited also to Nepal; resident at New Delhi.

Name: Loy W. Henderson
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Terminationof Mission: Reaccredited when India became a republic; presented new credentials Feb 24, 1950; left post Sep 21, 1951
Notes: Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned after confirmation on Mar 2, 1949. Also accredited to Nepal; resident at New Delhi.

Name: Chester Bowles
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Notes: Also accredited to Nepal; resident at New Delhi.

Name: George V. Allen
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Notes: Also accredited to Nepal; resident at New Delhi.

Name: John Sherman Cooper
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Notes: Also accredited to Nepal; resident at New Delhi.

Name: Ellsworth Bunker
Title: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary
Notes: Also accredited to Nepal; resident at New Delhi. Commissioned during a recess of the Senate; recommissioned after confirmation on Jan 25, 1957.
